function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased window ventilation may expose occupants to extreme temperature profiles.","Impact":"Risk of discomfort, potential health issues, and reduced indoor air quality.","Mitigation":"Implement temperature regulation systems and provide guidelines for safe window ventilation practices.","Technologies":"Smart thermostats, automated window controls, and building management systems.","People":"Building occupants and residents.","Owner":"Building administrators and operators."},{"Description":"Close proximity in buildings may promote potential viral transfer from one residence to another.","Impact":"Risk of increased viral transmission and spread of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Implement social distancing guidelines, promote use of face masks, and provide guidelines for safe window ventilation practices.","Technologies":"Building management systems for monitoring occupancy and promoting ventilation practices.","People":"Building occupants and residents.","Owner":"Building administrators and operators."},{"Description":"Insufficient understanding of the impact of natural light on SARS-CoV-2 indoors.","Impact":"Uncertainty regarding the effectiveness of natural light in reducing the viability of SARS-CoV-2.","Mitigation":"Conduct further research on the impact of natural light on SARS-CoV-2 indoors and provide updated guidelines based on new findings.","Technologies":"UV light sensors, real-time monitoring systems, and research equipment for studying viral viability.","People":"Building administrators, researchers, and public health experts.","Owner":"Building administrators and operators."}]}
